t: Amazon Titan Embeddings is now generally available
s: Amazon Titan Embeddings is a text embeddings model that converts natural language text including single words, phrases, or even large documents, into numerical representations that can be used to power use cases such as search, personalization, and clustering based on semantic similarity.

t: Amazon Titan Multimodal Embeddings G1 model - Amazon Bedrock
s: Amazon Titan Foundation Models are pre-trained on large datasets, making them powerful, general-purpose models. Use them as-is, or customize them by fine tuning the models with your own data for a particular task without annotating large volumes of data.

t: Amazon Titan Text Embeddings - AWS AI Service Cards
s: Amazon Titan Text Embeddings (TTE) is a family of text embedding models designed for enterprise use cases. Each TTE model converts natural language text input, including words, phrases, or paragraphs, into a vector of numbers (technically, points within an embedding space).

t: RAG architecture with Voyage AI embedding models on Amazon SageMaker JumpStart and Anthropic Claude 3 models | AWS Machine Learning Blog
